element.short: Series identity of the selected instances
element.definition: Series identity and locating information of the DICOM SOP instances in the selection.
element.comments: Series component represents the series level identity and locator information of the DICOM SOP instances in the selection.
element.requirements: DICOM SOP instances are identified through the UIDs of the study - series - instance hierarchy. In addition, the locator at the series level provide a means of retrieving the entire series.
